Homesites
Start Body Content
Live where you play
A 55 and over golf community in beautiful Lakeland, Florida
ALL AVAILABLE LOTS HAVE BEEN SOLD!
New Home Site Information
We look forward to your interest in the new additions to the Sandpiper Community which is a 55 and older community located in Lakeland, Florida. It consists of approximately 1,200 existing homes developed in the mid to late 1980’s.
Recent renovations to the existing golf course have created the opportunity for the addition of 40 new homes and home sites on or adjacent the golf course within the existing community.
Within this website you will find a total of (10) proposed layouts which can be modified or upgraded to fit personal preferences. It is the intended for all new homes to be incorporated into the existing  Property Owners Association (POA) giving all new residents access to all POA amenities including the clubhouse, pool, tennis, pickle ball, and exercise facilities.
A little extra
In addition to the amenities the Sandpiper community provides, the golf course, golf clubhouse, restaurant, and bar, while separate from the POA, are open to all residents. Any purchase of a new home site and home qualifies each new resident to 50% off a first years single or couples golf membership
(golf membership is not a requirement of home ownership and golf facilities are open to non-members).
Learn More About Memberships
